description: This file is a Python script that utilizes the 'agno' package to interact with Confluence, an enterprise collaboration platform. It creates an agent with Confluence tools and performs various operations such as retrieving space details, page content, page names, and creating new pages.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that can perform tasks using specified tools.

classes.name: ConfluenceTools
classes.description: A class providing tools to interact with Confluence.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method of the agent to send a query and print the response.
